osc.description: object representing the OSC configuration of oscee

midi.description: object representing the MIDI configuration of oscee

ActionBase.title: Action
ActionBase.description: something that gets done as a result of trigger firing

params.description: object containg the action type specific settings

enabled.description: this property allows the action to be enabled or disabled

ActionLog.title: Log Action
ActionLog.description: something that gets done as a result of trigger firing

ActionMidiOutput.title: Midi Output Action
ActionMidiOutput.description: something that gets done as a result of trigger firing

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

port.description: the midi port number to output the message on

data.description: midi data to be sent as an array of 3 bytes

ActionOscForward.title: OSC Forward Action
ActionOscForward.description: something that gets done as a result of trigger firing

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

host.description: the hostname or address of the server to forward OSC to

port.description: the port to forward OSC to

protocol.description: the protocol to use when forwarding OSC

ActionOscOutput.title: OSC Output Action
ActionOscOutput.description: something that gets done as a result of trigger firing

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

host.description: the hostname or address of the server to send OSC to

port.description: the port to send OSC to

protocol.description: the protocol to use when sending OSC

_address.description: JS template of the OSC address has access to the msg object to subsitute in properties of the message that triggered this action

_args.description: array of args, strings will be ran through the templating engine same as the _address param

ActionShell.title: Shell Command Action
ActionShell.description: something that gets done as a result of trigger firing

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

_command.description: JS literal template of the shell command will have access to the properties of the incoming message that triggered this action

command.description: the shell command to run _command takes priority

TriggerBase.title: Trigger
TriggerBase.description: trigger is an incoming message filter based on the type and the params messages can cause the trigger to fire its associated actions

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

actions.description: an array of actions to be performed if this trigger is fired

enabled.description: this property allows the trigger to be enabled or disabled

TriggerHost.title: Host Trigger
TriggerHost.description: trigger is an incoming message filter based on the type and the params messages can cause the trigger to fire its associated actions

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

host.description: the hostname or address of the server to match incoming messages against

TriggerMidiBytesEqual.title: Midi Bytes Equals Trigger
TriggerMidiBytesEqual.description: trigger is an incoming message filter based on the type and the params messages can cause the trigger to fire its associated actions

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

data.description: an array of 3 bytes that will be matched to the incoming message

TriggerMidiNoteOff.title: Midi Note Off Trigger
TriggerMidiNoteOff.description: trigger is an incoming message filter based on the type and the params messages can cause the trigger to fire its associated actions

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

note.description: the note value to match against incoming the messages

velocity.description: the velocity value to match against the incoming message

TriggerMidiNoteOn.title: Midi Note On Trigger
TriggerMidiNoteOn.description: trigger is an incoming message filter based on the type and the params messages can cause the trigger to fire its associated actions

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

note.description: the note value to match against incoming the messages

velocity.description: the velocity value to match against the incoming message

TriggerRegex.title: Regex Trigger
TriggerRegex.description: trigger is an incoming message filter based on the type and the params messages can cause the trigger to fire its associated actions

params.description: object containg the trigger type specific settings

properties.description: an array of properties on the msg to match the regex patterns to 1:1
